channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned car, 25th September
item.description:
A Silver Volkswagon has been left outside number 10 for several weeks now, tax expired on 9th August, please remove as causing issues with other residents parking.

item.title: Abandoned vehicle and trailer, 25th September
item.description:
Vehicle plus trailer has been parked since at least 9 July 2025 on main road. Leaves and debris building up. MOT has expired. Vehicles are an obstruction especially when turning into 7 Sundridge Avenue when one has to veer into the path of oncoming (and generally speeding well over the 30mph limit) traffic on a bend in order to turn right

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sundridge Avenue, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Green Park hasn't been cleaned for over a month., 25th September
item.description:
Green Park, located next to Livermere Road, has not been cleaned for over a month. Yesterday, someone cut the lawn, and now it is full of rubbish everywhere. This neglect is creating increasingly unacceptable conditions and requires urgent remedial action.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Livermere Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
